Name: Valkyrie Cocktail
Instructions: Prepare garnish of pinek grapefruit zest twist.
Review: This sipping drink has a rich vanilla sweet 'n' sour flavour.
History: Created in 2003 by yours truly, London, England.  Valkyrie comes from Norse mythology and literally translates as 'chooser of the slain'.
Nutrition: One serving of Valkyrie Cocktail contains 190 calories
